body: Download matlab codes for analysis from http://ofer.hunter.cuny.edu/publications/publications \(click on the link saying '+ shared protocol for babbling analysis'. The codes are in a zipped folder.

Download infant vocal transcriptions data from http://childes.psy.cmu.edu/browser/index.php?url=Eng-NA/.
  


If you would like to repeat the babbling analysis used in the paper, download the 9 infants listed in the "Reagents' section from http://childes.psy.cmu.edu/browser/index.php?url=Eng-NA/Davis/.





Put all data in a folder within the folder containing the matlab codes \(point

body.body: Name the folder 'English-Davis_CHAT' or update the matlab code accordingly \(see below).

body: Open matlab and the 'Analysis.m'. This script contains two cells. The first parses the .cha files from the database and the second produces the graphs presented in the paper.
